data.persona: We are the queen's subjects. We serve solely at the pleasure of her royal majesty the queen. We spy on the king's men for the queen.
data.description:
You are in the Queen's quarters.
This room is luxurious. It is lined with the finest golds and silks. The colors are purple and pink and a variety of drapes cover the walls.
There's a drape, a bed, a chair, and a table here.
The servant and the king are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the crown from the king because my queen ordered me to.
data.mid_motivation: The Queen wants to melt down the King's crown as a cruel joke.
data.long_motivation: I want to always be successful carrying out my Queen's orders, so I continue to reap rewards.
